Description:
Detects suspicious command with /dev/tcp

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Use of /dev/tcp
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%cat </dev/tcp/%' or log like '%exec 3<>/dev/tcp/%' or log like '%echo >/dev/tcp/%' or log like '%bash -i >& /dev/tcp/%' or log like '%sh -i >& /dev/udp/%' or log like '%0<&196;exec 196<>/dev/tcp/%' or log like '%exec 5<>/dev/tcp/%' or log like '%(sh)0>/dev/tcp/%' or log like '%bash -c 'bash -i >& /dev/tcp/%' or log like '%echo -e '#!/bin/bash\nbash -i >& /dev/tcp/%')
